tasks.title: Daily Misting
tasks.description: Mist enclosure thoroughly to maintain 60-80% humidity. Focus on plants and glass surfaces to create water droplets for drinking.

tasks.title: Feed Crickets/Dubia
tasks.description: Offer 3-5 appropriately-sized insects (body length = distance between frog's eyes). Dust with calcium powder.

tasks.title: Change Water Dish
tasks.description: Replace water in ground dish with dechlorinated water. Clean dish if soiled.

tasks.title: Spot Clean
tasks.description: Remove any feces, uneaten food, or dead feeders. Check for mold on decor.

tasks.title: Health Check
tasks.description: Observe behavior, skin condition, eating habits, and activity level. Check for signs of MBD, bloating, or lethargy.

tasks.title: Multivitamin Supplement
tasks.description: Dust feeders with reptile multivitamin powder (Repashy Calcium Plus or similar).

tasks.title: Deep Clean Enclosure
tasks.description: Remove frog to temporary container. Clean all glass, decor, and plants. Replace substrate if non-bioactive. Sanitize with reptile-safe cleaner.
